title: Sandra Bullock And Kelly Clarkson Can't Stop Laughing During Interview
author: The Kelly Clarkson Show
description:
Kelly tries her best to keep her cool in the presence of Academy Award-winner Sandra Bullock, and contagious laughter ensues. Sandra and Kelly dish about everything from their love of Texas, Sandra's new movie, struggling with forgiveness, singers in their families and Christmas decorations. Buckle up.

#KellyClarksonShow #SandraBullock
